name: In the Interest of C.W. a minor. Appeal of LAWRENCE COUNTY CHILDREN'S SERVICES

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: In the Interest of C.W. a minor. Appeal of LAWRENCE COUNTY CHILDREN’S SERVICES.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Superior Court is reversed, and the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Lawrence County is reinstated. See In Re: Adoption of Faith M., 509 Pa. 238, 501 A.2d 1105 (1985), and In the Matter of the Adoption of G.T.M., 506 Pa. 44, 483 A.2d 1355 (1984).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Sydney W. Paul, New Castle, for appellant.
Donald Williams, New Castle (Court-appointed), for Natural Mother.
Annette Hutchison, Office of Dist. Atty., New Castle (Court-appointed), for C.W., a minor.
casebody.head_matter:
547 A.2d 751
In the Interest of C.W. a minor. Appeal of LAWRENCE COUNTY CHILDREN’S SERVICES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1988.
Decided Sept. 29, 1988.
Sydney W. Paul, New Castle, for appellant.
Donald Williams, New Castle (Court-appointed), for Natural Mother.
Annette Hutchison, Office of Dist. Atty., New Castle (Court-appointed), for C.W., a minor.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
